res.title: Exhaustion
res.subHead: GhostBoard Exhaustion utilizes advanced Candlestick Reading Pattern Recognition by detecting the candles breaking into a downtrend or uptrend move consecutively closing lower/higher to pinpoint exhaustion points on charts, empowering traders to anticipate market reversals and optimize decision-making.
res.body:
Unique Indicator
Using mathematically calculated moves on candlestick readings for exhaustion.

This indicator will show a 'Bullish Exhaustion' or a 'Bearish Exhaustion'. Edits can be made in settings.

If you see an 'E' Label Pointing UP Print below the candle while price moving down, this indicates a 'Bullish Exhaustion', calculating price should reverse and move back up.

If you see an 'E' Label Pointing DOWN Print Above the candle while price moving up, this indicates a 'Bearish Exhaustion', calculating price should reverse and move back down.

res.title: Candle Type (The Strat)
res.subHead: This script identifies the 3 different candle types for use in TheStrat
res.body:
Candle Type 1 - Inside Candle
Candle Type 2- Up or Down Candle
Candle Type 3 - Engulfing Candle

Analysis of the candle types can help you define actionable trades

TIP: TURN OFF CANDLE TYPE 2 IN SETTINGS AFTER ADDING
